definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: porcupine (fr, rolling itself together; LXX e)xi=noi (alw. pl.), Vulgate ericius, Bo:Hieroz. Iii, cap. 36 Post:Hastings DB BITTEBN; > (from context) bittern Tr:NHB 243 Hi Che Gu Kau; v. discussion by M‘Lean-Shipley:Ency. Bib. BITTERN);—´[[ק]]: as haunting desolate places, Is 14:23, Zep 2:14, [[קִפּוֹד]] Is 34:11.
